name: Healthy Holstein Cow
description: A Holstein cow known for high milk production, suitable for dairy farming. Each cow comes with verified health and vaccination records.

name: Jersey Cow (Milk Production)
description: A Jersey cow known for its rich and creamy milk. Ideal for small dairy farms, with complete vaccination records included.

name: Angus Cow (Beef Production)
description: A high-quality Angus cow raised for beef production. Comes with comprehensive health certifications and feeding recommendations.

name: Brahman Cow (Tropical Adaptation)
description: A resilient Brahman cow well-suited for tropical climates. Vaccinated and acclimated to high temperatures and humidity.

name: Simmental Cow (Dual Purpose)
description: A Simmental cow ideal for both milk and meat production. Comes with health certifications and guidance for optimal care.

name: Guernsey Cow (High Butterfat Milk)
description: A Guernsey cow producing milk rich in beta-carotene and butterfat. Great for dairy farms focused on premium milk quality.

name: Charolais Cow (Beef Production)
description: A Charolais cow bred for superior beef yield. Comes with detailed health and feed recommendations for maximum production.

name: Brown Swiss Cow
description: A hardy Brown Swiss cow known for consistent milk production and a calm temperament. Includes health certifications and care instructions.

name: Dexter Cow (Small-Scale Farming)
description: A compact Dexter cow ideal for small-scale farms, providing both milk and beef. Comes with vaccination records and care tips.

name: Hereford Cow (Beef Production)
description: A Hereford cow prized for high-quality beef. Well-suited for pasture-based farming, with full vaccination and health records.

name: Highland Cow (Cold Climate Adaptation)
description: A Highland cow known for its long hair and adaptability to cold climates. Excellent for beef production with minimal care.

name: Ayrshire Cow (Milk Production)
description: An Ayrshire cow producing high quantities of milk, suitable for mid-sized dairy operations. Vaccinated and well-cared-for.

name: Shorthorn Cow (Dual Purpose)
description: A versatile Shorthorn cow suitable for both milk and beef. Comes with comprehensive care guidelines and vaccination records.

name: Brangus Cow (Crossbreed Efficiency)
description: A Brangus cow combining the best traits of Brahman and Angus breeds. Ideal for beef production in warm climates.

name: Galloway Cow (Beef and Hide)
description: A Galloway cow prized for lean beef and high-quality hides. Comes with documentation for optimal farming practices.

name: Holstein Heifer (Young Dairy Cow)
description: A young Holstein heifer ready for integration into a dairy farm. Certified for health and early milk production potential.

name: Texas Longhorn Cow
description: A Texas Longhorn cow known for its resilience and unique horns. Excellent for ranch settings or beef production.

name: Milking Shorthorn Cow
description: A Milking Shorthorn cow providing high-quality milk. Ideal for dual-purpose farms seeking milk and occasional beef.

name: Gelbvieh Cow (Meat and Milk)
description: A Gelbvieh cow suitable for both meat and milk production. Known for efficient growth and feed conversion.

name: Organic Grass-Fed Cow
description: A grass-fed cow raised under organic standards. Perfect for premium beef production or eco-conscious dairy farming.

name: Murray Grey Cow
description: A Murray Grey cow known for efficient beef production and ease of management. Great for small to medium-sized farms.

name: Fleckvieh Cow (European Breed)
description: A Fleckvieh cow from Europe, ideal for milk and meat. Comes with a detailed pedigree and health certifications.

name: Belgian Blue Cow
description: A Belgian Blue cow bred for its exceptional muscle growth. Excellent for high-yield beef production.

name: Norwegian Red Cow
description: A Norwegian Red cow providing consistent milk yield with excellent udder health. Well-suited for colder climates.

name: Miniature Zebu Cow
description: A small Zebu cow ideal for hobby farms or small-scale agriculture. Known for hardiness and low maintenance.

name: Friesian Cow
description: A Friesian cow producing large quantities of milk. Vaccinated and certified for excellent health.

name: Crossbred Dairy Cow
description: A crossbred dairy cow optimized for high yield and adaptability. Suitable for various farming environments.

name: Purebred Angus Steer
description: A purebred Angus steer ready for beef production. Comes with lineage documentation and health records.

name: Organic Dairy Cow
description: A dairy cow raised under organic standards. Provides milk free from synthetic hormones and antibiotics.

name: Polled Hereford Cow
description: A Polled Hereford cow known for high-quality beef and ease of handling. Perfect for small to mid-sized farms.

name: Red Poll Cow
description: A Red Poll cow ideal for milk and meat production. Known for calm temperament and adaptability.

name: Wagyu Cow
description: A premium Wagyu cow for producing marbled beef of the highest quality. Comes with complete lineage and care instructions.

name: Droughtmaster Cow
description: A Droughtmaster cow resilient to dry conditions, ideal for beef production in arid regions. Fully vaccinated and certified healthy.

name: Holstein Steer
description: A Holstein steer suitable for beef production. Excellent feed conversion and vaccinated for health.

name: Piedmontese Cow
description: A Piedmontese cow producing tender, low-fat beef. Comes with documentation for optimal care and feeding.

name: Belted Galloway Cow
description: A Belted Galloway cow prized for both beef and milk. Unique appearance with a distinctive white belt.

name: Kangayam Cow
description: A Kangayam cow from India, excellent for draught work and milk. Vaccinated and adapted for hot climates.

name: Native Indian Gir Cow
description: A Gir cow known for A2 milk production. Comes with pedigree details and complete health records.

name: Nellore Cow
description: A Nellore cow known for resilience and beef production. Excellent for tropical environments with verified health certifications.

name: Organic Simmental Cow
